Comment: I just need someone to show me and everyone else where it says that local law enforcement is obligated to enforce federal immigration policy.  Because that's all a "sanctuary city" is.  A jurisdiction declining to assist ICE and Border Patro in enforcing immigration policy; something which is entirely within their right.  Any day now.  You fucking shit heads crying about "criminals" need to start advocating for rounding up j-walkers for detention if you want to consistent on the law & order side of the argument, because it's the same level offense, and you'd think these people would get something resembling due process before being shipped to a concentration camp for "Didn't look both ways before crossing the road" levels of civil infraction.

Comment: Support your local communities, especially those being targeted. Stay engaged with people you know, and if you don’t know people, go meet some helping those in need, or at protests. Keep up the pressure on politicians/officials that are looking to cave. Stay informed from trusted sources. Avoid doomscrolling and delete any apps that feed you info you didn’t ask for; they want nothing more than for people to give up hope.
Author: meTspysball
